item.title: Apache
item.description: Apache https://github.com/apache/httpd http://httpd.apache.org/ ubuntu/debian： 1 sudo aptitude install apache2 redhat/centos/fedora: 1 $ sudo yum install httpd2 启动服务器： 1 service apache2 start 启动浏览器查看： 1 http://localhost:80 apache命令 a2ensite 1 $ sudo a2ensite <site> a2dissite 1 $ sudo a2dissite <site> a2enmod
